channel.title: Where are the Pk Points? [REP++]
channel.description:
Hey, For some reason i can't find to change it so my character has 2147000000 pkpoints. This is the Character File
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3083 character-posy = 3504 character-rights = 3 crystal-bow-shots = 0 skull-timer = 0 magic-book = 0 character-tqp = 0 character-q1 = 0 brother-info = 0 0 brother-info = 1 0 brother-info = 2 0 brother-info = 3 0 brother-info = 4 0 brother-info = 5 0 special-amount = 2.147E9 selected-coffin = 0 barrows-killcount = 2147000000 teleblock-length = 0 pc-points = 2147000000 isDonator = 1 slayerTask = 0 taskAmount = 0 magePoints = 2147000000 autoRet = 0 barrowskillcount = 2147000000 flagged = false wave = 1 gwkc = 0 fightMode = 2 pvpWep = 0 pvpBod = 0 pvpLeg = 0 pvpHel = 0 pvpPoi = 0 donated = 1 void = 0 0 0 0 0
Help me Find it? Pl0x?
